verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I sing praises to Your name
Praises to Your name
The name that's so much higher than all names

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
All honor to Your name
All honor to Your name
The name that's so much greater than all names

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Be lifted up
Be lifted higher
Be lifted up
Be lifted higher

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Your name is life
Your name is hope inside me, hope inside me
Your name is love
A love that always finds me, always finds me

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
You alone are the Holy One
You alone are the Lord
You alone are the Most High Jesus Christ

verse.name: b2
verse.lines:
Everlasting Father
Everlasting father we are yours
with the Saints and Choirs of Angels
we cry 'Holy' we are yours

verse.name: e1
verse.lines:
Everlasting Father
Everlasting Father we are yours
with the Saints and Choirs of Angels
we cry 'Holy' we are yours
